*In France: 1st avoidable cause of death = 75,000 deaths/year
**Tobacco is the 1<sup>rst</sup> preventable cause of cardiovascular death.
**1<sup>rst</sup> cardiovascular DRF in non-menopausal women
**Fetal death in utero
**Mortality from cancer (lung > other cancers) > cardiovascular disease > respiratory disease

question.title: What is the leading preventable cause of death in France?

option_a.title: Mortality from cancer (lung > other cancers)
option_a.description: A common cause of death, but not preventable

option_b.title: Respiratory disease
option_b.description: A preventable cause of death, but not the leading one

option_d.title: Tobacco is the 1st preventable cause of cardiovascular death
option_d.description: The correct answer, according to the data

correct_option.title: D
correct_option.description: The correct letter of the answer
